titleStmt.title: Lues venera wherein the names, nature, subject, causes, signes, and cure, are handled, mistakes in these discovered, rectified, doubts and questions succinctly resolved / by John Wynell ...
titleStmt.author: Wynell, John, fl. 1660-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for the author and are to be sold by H. Herringman ...,
